properties.name: Salar de Uyuni
properties.description: World's largest salt flat creating perfect mirror reflections after rain

properties.name: Lake Titicaca (Bolivia side)
properties.description: Floating reed islands of Uros people on highest navigable lake

properties.name: Eduardo Avaroa Reserve
properties.description: Surreal high-altitude landscapes with colored lagoons and flamingos

properties.name: Death Road (Yungas Road)
properties.description: World's most dangerous road, now famous cycling route with dramatic drops

properties.name: Tiwanaku
properties.description: UNESCO Pre-Columbian archaeological site, one of oldest and highest ancient cities

properties.name: La Paz Cable Car System
properties.description: World's highest capital with spectacular cable car network over the city

properties.name: Sucre (White City)
properties.description: UNESCO constitutional capital with beautiful colonial whitewashed architecture

properties.name: Isla del Sol
properties.description: Sacred island on Lake Titicaca believed to be birthplace of Inca civilization

properties.name: Laguna Colorada
properties.description: Red-tinted salt lake with thousands of flamingos in Eduardo Avaroa Reserve
